Nekobito - A Markdown Text Editor on Browser

    Keyboard Shortcuts

    KeyAction
    Ctrl + nNew Draft
    Ctrl + lOpen Sidebar
    Ctrl + sSave Draft
    Ctrl + dDelete Draft
    When sidebar is opened
    KeyAction
    kup
    jdown
    oopen

    About Nekobito

    Nekobito is a browser-based Markdown editor created by @gaaamii.

    You can see the source code at the Github Repository

    Enjoy your writing!
